title: That Man - The Wedding Story, Part 2
description: The highly anticipated epic conclusion to the USA Today bestselling THAT MAN series.You are invited to the wedding of the century. Attire: Be prepared to laugh, cry, and swoon.Sexy as sin Blake Burns and his tiger, Jennifer McCoy, are finally going to tie the knot.Or not.While a delusional, jealous ex and a looming dark secret from Blake's past still threatens their relationship, an unexpected life-or-death event may send their “I do’s” into Neverland.Battling against the odds, Blake and Jennifer struggle to find their happily ever after. Only a miracle— and that man— can make it happen.
author: Nelle L'Amour
